homePage.fromIdeaToBatchText:
We transform yarn into colors that will delight you for years to come. Every stage — from shade development to delivery — is carried out with meticulous attention to detail and strict quality
control.
homePage.hero: Dyed yarn — more than just color
homePage.heroText: We create not just threads, but the foundation for inspiring collections. Our shades combine aesthetics, durability, and sustainability — so your products stand out from the rest.
homePage.machine: With over 3+ years of experience, we guarantee consistent dyed yarn quality for textile manufacturers and industrial clients.
homePage.home1:
Each batch goes through a full journey from raw material to
a unique shade created for your order
homePage.subtitle: Unique shades — tailored to your request and style.

reviews.text: We have been working with RAINBOW-TEKS for over a year. The quality of the dyed yarn is always consistent, the shades fully meet our requirements, and deliveries are always on time. I highly recommend them as a reliable supplier!
reviews.name: Russia

reviews.text: We ordered cotton and viscose yarn for our sweater collection. The colors are vibrant, the threads are soft, and they work perfectly on our factory’s equipment. The service is excellent — the managers are always available and responsive.
reviews.name: Italy

reviews.text: RAINBOW-TEKS is a partner you can trust. Orders for acrylic and poly-cotton yarn always arrive quickly and without defects. We especially appreciate the company’s flexibility in selecting the right counts and shades.
reviews.name: Turkey

footer.title: Want to learn more about our yarn? Call us!
footer.label: Phone
footer.text: Contact us for a consultation, yarn selection, or to place an order. We’re always happy to help you choose the perfect color and quality!

about.text1: For over 3 years, RAINBOW-TEKS LLC has been successfully operating both in the domestic and international markets. We offer dyed yarn made from 100% cotton, viscose, acrylic, and poly-cotton of any count — combining consistent quality with a modern approach.
about.text3: 100% cotton: from Ne10/1 to Ne50/1 — single or multi-ply twist, tailored for any application.
about.text4: All products meet ISO 9001:2015 and OEKO-TEX® Standard 100 standards — ensuring safety and consistent quality.
about.text5: We manufacture premium-quality products in accordance with international standards.
about.text6: An individual approach to every client — adapting to your requirements and deadlines.
about.text7: Reliable supply, strict adherence to delivery schedules, and long-term partnerships.
about.text8: We match shades using Pantone, color charts, or your own samples — with maximum accuracy and speed.
about.text11: We specialize in dyeing yarn made from 100% natural cotton. Each thread retains its strength and softness, while the color preserves its richness and durability.

stepCards.title: Daily capacity
stepCards.text: The facility is capable of producing up to 10 tons of products per day.

stepCards.title: Annual output
stepCards.text: The total production capacity reaches 3,600 tons per year.

stepCards.title: Shade Development
stepCards.text: Creating new color samples takes no more than 3 working days.

projectsss.title: Rewinding
projectsss.intro: Raw yarn undergoes quality control and is rewound onto cones, ensuring stability and readiness for dyeing.
projectsss.date: Yarn Inspection and Rewinding onto Cones
projectsss.about: Raw yarn undergoes strict quality control: irregularities, knots, and fiber breaking load are checked. Then it goes to winding machines, where it is carefully rewound onto plastic cones — this preparatory stage ensures even dyeing and high quality of the finished product.
projectsss.results: Rewinding achieves stable thread tension, an ideal base for dyeing, and reliability in further production.

services.title: Quality Control
services.description: Checking yarn for defects and compliance with strength standards.

services.title: Rewinding onto Cones
services.description: Forming convenient bobbins for stable dyeing process.

services.title: Uniform Tension
services.description: Ensuring proper structure and density of the thread.

services.title: Preparation for Dyeing
services.description: Creating an ideal base for further technological stages.

projectsss.title: Dyeing
projectsss.intro: During the dyeing stage, yarn is dyed using an active method in the selected shade, after which samples undergo laboratory checks for durability, uniformity, and color quality.
projectsss.date: Active Dyeing and Color Quality Control
projectsss.about: During the dyeing stage, yarn acquires its future shade. We use active dyeing, which ensures saturation, uniformity, and durability of the color. After dyeing, samples from each batch are taken for laboratory tests.
projectsss.results: Dyeing guarantees brightness, durability, and compliance with international quality standards, making our yarn a reliable choice for fabric and knitwear production.

services.title: Dyeing Check
services.description: Control of color uniformity on each bobbin.

services.title:
Rub Resistance
(ISO 105-X12)
services.description: Testing color strength under mechanical impact.

services.title:
Color Fastness
(ISO 105-C05)
services.description: Checking shade retention during washing and care.

services.title: Spirality (ISO 3071)
services.description: Measuring stability of shape and structure of dyed yarn.

projectsss.title: Drying
projectsss.intro: After successful quality control, the dyed yarn is sent for drying, where its strength, softness, and color uniformity are preserved.
projectsss.about: After positive results, the dyed yarn goes to drying. Modern equipment ensures uniform moisture removal, preserving fiber strength, softness, and shade stability. Gentle drying guarantees that each bobbin retains its properties and is ready for further processing.
projectsss.results: Drying fixes the color, preserves texture, and prepares yarn for the next production stage.

services.title: Uniform Drying
services.description: Moisture removal without loss of quality and fiber softness.

services.title: Color Preservation
services.description: Fixing saturation and durability of dyed yarn.

services.title: Moisture Control
services.description: Maintaining optimal level for further processing.

services.title: Preparation for Next Stage
services.description: Creating an ideal base for rewinding onto cardboard cones.

projectsss.title: Rewinding on Cardboard Cones
projectsss.intro: After drying, the yarn is rewound onto cardboard cones and undergoes strength, color durability, and dyeing uniformity checks.
projectsss.date: Rewinding and Quality Control of Dyed Yarn
projectsss.about: After drying, the yarn is rewound onto cardboard cones — this is the final preparation before packaging and shipping to the customer. At this stage, additional samples are taken for quality checks: testing for rub resistance, color fastness, and dyeing uniformity is conducted. Sock unwinding is also performed on a special device to ensure no undyed areas across the entire bobbin surface.
projectsss.results: Rewinding onto cardboard cones ensures convenience for further use, and quality control guarantees color stability and compliance with international standards.

services.title:
Rub Resistance
(ISO 105-X12)
services.description: Testing color preservation under mechanical impact.

services.title:
Color Fastness
(ISO 105-C05)
services.description: Checking shade durability to washing and care.

services.title: Dyeing Uniformity Check
services.description: Sock unwinding to detect undyed areas.

services.title: Forming on Cardboard Cones
services.description: Convenient winding form for storage, transportation, and further use.

projectsss.title: Laboratory
projectsss.intro: In the laboratory, each batch of yarn undergoes detailed control: shade check, rub resistance, and color fastness, guaranteeing stable product quality.
projectsss.date: Testing Dyed Yarn According to International Standards
projectsss.about: In the laboratory, each batch of dyed yarn undergoes detailed quality control. Shade, dyeing uniformity, rub resistance, and washing impact are checked. International testing standards are used, guaranteeing stable characteristics and high product quality.
projectsss.results: Laboratory tests confirm yarn compliance with customer requirements and international standards, ensuring reliability of each batch.

services.title: Shade Check
services.description: Control of color accuracy and uniformity.

services.title:
Rub Resistance
(ISO 105-X12)
services.description: Testing color strength under mechanical impact.

services.title:
Color Fastness
(ISO 105-C05)
services.description: Testing shade durability during washing and care.

services.title: Standards Compliance
services.description: Confirming product quality according to international methods.

projectsss.title: Packaging
projectsss.intro: After final quality control, each yarn bobbin is labeled, hermetically packaged, and placed in cardboard boxes, ensuring reliable protection and convenient product identification.
projectsss.date: Labeling and Packaging Yarn in Individual and Transport Packages
projectsss.about: After positive quality control results, yarn goes to packaging. Each bobbin is labeled with buyer, yarn number, color, color code, and batch number. Then bobbins are packaged in cellophane bags and stacked in cardboard boxes. Boxes are also labeled with buyer, yarn number, batch, color, and net/gross weight.
projectsss.results: Packaging ensures reliable yarn protection during storage and transportation, as well as convenient identification throughout the supply chain.

services.title: Bobbin Labeling
services.description: Applying buyer, yarn number, batch, and color data.

services.title: Individual Packaging
services.description: Each bobbin is hermetically packaged in a cellophane bag.

services.title: Box Forming
services.description: Bobbins are neatly stacked and placed in cardboard boxes.

services.title: Box Labeling
services.description: Marking buyer, batch number, color, and weight for accurate identification.
